query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		paymenttransactionedge {
			node {
				activity_date,
				activity_description,
				balance,
				bounty_award,
				bounty_fee,
				debit_or_credit_amount,
				formatted_payer_type,
				hacker_id,
				hacker_url,
				hacker_username,
				id,
				payer_id,
				payer_url,
				payer_username,
				payment_id,
				payment_transaction_type,
				report_id,
				report_url,
				team_handle,
				team_id,
				team_url,
			},
		}
	}
